title: 服务器的空岛玩家们没有权限！
author: xi_kun
txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=205923&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D7%26searchoption%5B62%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D%25E7%25A9%25BA%25E5%25B2%259B%26searchoption%5B62%5D%5Btype%5D%3D
这个空岛插件的权限要怎么给玩家啊？

replies.author: 云闪
replies.txt_content:
例：/mangaddp builder islandworld.create.normal 给builder权限组创造普通空岛的权限（话说有特殊空岛？），然后你看看想添加哪个就照着这个样子加，权限作用关注每行最后一个单词即可
islandworld.create.normal (重要) 
islandworld.island.create
islandworld.island.delete
islandworld.island.info
islandworld.island.spawn
islandworld.island.home
islandworld.island.sethome
islandworld.island.delhome
islandworld.island.fixhome
islandworld.island.expell
islandworld.island.add
islandworld.island.remove
islandworld.island.tp
islandworld.island.leave
islandworld.island.visit
islandworld.island.accept
islandworld.island.deny
islandworld.island.calc
islandworld.island.rank
islandworld.island.lock
islandworld.island.unlock
islandworld.island.biomelist
islandworld.island.biomeshow
islandworld.island.biomeset
islandworld.island.biomechunkset
islandworld.islandev.challenges   （任务权限)
islandworld.challenges.*   (建议添加)
islandworld.challenges.list  (建议添加)
islandworld.challenges.complete    (建议添加)
islandworld.islandev.sethome    （设置岛的出生点权限)
islandworld.islandev.fixhome
islandworld.islandev.tp     (传送权限）
islandworld.islandev.delete
islandworld.islandev.info
islandworld.islandev.reload
islandworld.islandev.save
islandworld.islandev.stats
islandworld.islandev.setspawn
islandworld.islandev.biomeshow
islandworld.islandev.biomelist
islandworld.islandev.biomeset
islandworld.islandev.calc
islandworld.islandev.rank
islandworld.islandev.protect
islandworld.islandev.unprotect

replies.author: xi_kun
replies.txt_content:
splt 发表于 2014-10-1 15:29
例：/mangaddp builder islandworld.create.normal 给builder权限组创造普通空岛的权限（话说有特殊空岛？ ...
怎么知道玩家有没有权限？

replies.author: 云闪
replies.txt_content:
xi_kun 发表于 2014-10-1 16:18
怎么知道玩家有没有权限？
玩家使用某个命令的时候提示没权限就是没有权限咯。你也可以看看权限组管理插件的配置文件，前提是你能看懂…
